subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Zach Parise scored twice and Martin Brodeur made 40 saves for the Devils, who ended a three-game winless streak on Tuesday night with a 4-1 victory over the Maple Leafs in Toronto.
snippet: Zach Parise scored twice and Martin Brodeur made 40 saves for the Devils, who ended a three-game winless streak on Tuesday night with a 4-1 victory over the Maple Leafs in Toronto.
